sentences.en: All hand baggage would be x-rayed.
sentences.cn: 所有的手提行李都要接受X光检查。

sentences.en: Check your baggage in at the desk.
His chief political baggage consisted of a violent antiracism.
sentences.cn: 他的主要政治理论是强烈的反种族主义.

sentences.en: How much emotional baggage is he bringing with him into the relationship?
sentences.cn: 他背负着多重的感情包袱开始这段恋情？

sentences.en: Most of our flights have a baggage allowance of 44lbs per passenger.
sentences.cn: 我们大多数航班行李限重为每位乘客44磅。

sentences.en: Our progress was embarrassed by lots of baggage.
sentences.cn: 大量的行李使我们行进困难.

sentences.en: Several of the delays were caused by the new high-tech baggage system.
sentences.cn: 几次延误都是由新的高科技行李传送系统造成的。

sentences.en: The baggage followed in the rear of the troops on march.
sentences.cn: 辎重跟随在行进军队的后部.

sentences.en: The baggage hall was crowded and noisy.
The baggage was being rapidly stowed away for transportation.
sentences.cn: 行李正在迅速装载等待运输。

sentences.en: The passengers went through immigration control and collected their baggage.
sentences.cn: 旅客通过入境检查后领取了自己的行李。

sentences.en: The train has twenty cars , the baggage and mail ones excluded.
sentences.cn: 这列火车, 刨去行李车和邮车,有20节车箱.

sentences.en: The youth gave me his hand when I was lifting my baggage.
sentences.cn: 当我提行李时,那个年轻人来帮我.

sentences.en: They came panting up to his door with their unwieldy baggage.
sentences.cn: 他们提着笨重的行李气喘吁吁地来到他门口。

sentences.en: We piled all the baggage in and drove off.
sentences.cn: 我们把全部行李塞进去就开车走了.

sentences.en: You can check your baggage right through to its final destination.
sentences.cn: 你可以把行李直接托运到终点。

phrases.tran_cn: 行李重量限额；免费携带行李；行李津贴
n. 邮件车厢；行李车厢
行李认领；领取行李；取行李处
行李认领处；取行李处；行李认领区

trans.tran_en: the cases, bags, boxes etc carried by someone who is travelling
